title: Giro d’Italia Start and Route Still Unknown Until January … but the Vuelta a España Will Debut in Italy
content:
Vuelta a España to make history next August with a first-ever race start in Italy. Early details are emerging.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Start and Route Still Unknown Until January … but the Vuelta a España Will Debut in Italy on Velo.
author: sstokes
